description:
《超能陆战队》（英语：Big Hero 6，直译“六大英雄”），是一部2014年上映的美国3D电脑动画超级英雄喜剧电影，第87届奥斯卡金像奖最佳动画长片得主。

片段剧本如下：

-Who are you?
-I'm...
-Go go, this is my brother Hiro.
-Welcome to the nerd lab.
-Yeah.
-I've never seen electro-mag suspension on a bike before.
-Zero resistance, faster bike. But, not fast enough...
...yet.
-Do not move. Behind the line, please.
-Hey, wasabi. This is my brother Hiro.
-Hello, Hiro. Prepare to be amazed. Catch.
-Wow. Laser-induced plasma?
-Oh, yeah. With a little magnetic confinement for ultra-precision.
-Wow. How do you find anything in this mess? I have a system. There's a place for everything, and everything in its place.
-Need this!
-You can't do that!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-That's a whole lot of tungsten carbide.
-400 pounds of it! Come here, come here, come here. You're going to love this. A dash of perchloric acid, a smidge of cobalt, a hint of hydrogen peroxide, super-heated to 500 Kelvin, and... Ta-da! It's pretty great, huh?
-It's so pink.
-Here's the best part. I know, right? Chemical metal embrittlement.
-Not bad, honey lemon.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-Who's Fred?
-This guy, right here! Don't be alarmed. It is just a suit. This is not my real face and body. The name's Fred. School mascot by day, but by night... I am also a school mascot.
-So, what's your major?
-No, no, no, I'm not a student. But I am a major science enthusiast.

  • 明明不怎么忙却还是觉得忙？每天都在瞎忙啥
  • 时间将带走一切，唯独回忆与情愫将永存
  • 全球十大最浪漫婚礼目的地：看着就好幸福
  • 支付宝转账要收费啦！ 还能愉快的转转转吗？
  • 有声美文：一个人的旅行，遇见最真实的自己
  • 读了这篇，时间介词全掌握
  • 待办事项太多忙不过来？5步就可以搞定！
  • 天才大咖吃货的奇特喜好 看完简直冲击三观
  • 68届艾美奖提名，国人心头好有谁上榜？
